channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Two white chairs dumped outside 2 Archie Street, 8th October
item.description:
Two of the white chairs advertised by Knight Frank (“ 2 bedroom penthouse for sale in Archie Street, London, SE1”, Property Ref: cnw012553211) were dumped in the bin room then the street outside the building. Residents already reported this to Knight Frank, who say they asked the flat to remove them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Archie Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tennis courts security fence West Heath Recreation Ground, 8th October
item.description:
Someone has attempted to pull open one section of the metal fence on the left hand side of the courts. This is on the strip of land between the Lawn bowls club and the tennis courts . This will allow anyone free access to the courts and to be able to open the gate to the courts. This may result in further vandalism to the tennis courts surface from bikes being ridden on them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clovelly Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary traffic lights not working - sutherland ave / harrow road, 8th October
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights at this uk power networks roadworks site (junction of Harrow Road and sutherland ave) have stopped working. Traffic is trying to negotiate narrow roadworks and it is dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 354, Harrow Road, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal car repairs as a business, 8th October
item.description:
There has become a trend of a mechanic repairing vehicles in Arbroath road on a daily basis . It’s becoming a trend and safe spot for this cowboy to repair vehicles on a daily basis . Currently there is a white ford transit connect having major repairs carried out here with . No concern for the public. Hazardous waste being left on a daily basis. Action is needed ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arbroath Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned, 8th October
item.description:
This vehicle has been abandoned since July , I have reported this twice and no one has done anything The van is behind our gates , there is a person there eating in morning and evening you can hear the door open and close. I have observed a person taking items out and putting in the van. This person maybe sleeping the van.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harrier Mews, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Northcote Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
